name: The Quick Brown Fox (Funki Monki)
description: I took the Game Jam theme of "Backspace" to represent editing. So what if you could edit a classic English sentence "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog"? Given my limited programming talent, you can't fully edit the sentence, but you can see the edits that I have made. Also, the reset button is broken, you'll have to refresh the page to restart.
